question: How we doing out there? Yes, I'm very warm and dry in here, thank you for your concern. A raise? I already pay you two bucks a day. Missed one darling. I love you too.
answer: " -- if not for the courage of the fearless crew -- " " -- the Minnow would be lost, the Minowwww would be lost."

question: PANTUCCI!!
answer: Can we use our indoor voice please...

question: I'm flying blind here God damn it!
answer: You trying to make me feel guilty?

question: Guilty will be the least of what you feel when I run my rig into one of these god damn no name islands! Get me well here!
answer: All better... Now tell me again... ...why we took this job?

question: If I told you once...I told you a thousand times...
answer: I know...I know...if the cash is there we don't care... Finnegan this is as mean a pile of shit as we ever carried... ...and some of it's coming your way.

question: You remember the first time we met Finnegan? I think you were just starting out...smuggling gold off Sumatra for those two Chinese...what did we use to call them?
answer: Fok Yu and Fok Yu Two...are we strolling down memory lane for any particular reason?

question: No, it just struck me as odd...I don't see you for all these years and you've still got the same tape stuck in the box.
answer: You know what they say...the classics are eternal.

question: So where are we?
answer: Right here...middle of nowhere...

question: And where is our point of arrival?
answer: Right here...middle of nowhere...and the answer to your question is yes.

question: Which question is that?
answer: The one you came up to ask...are we on schedule?

question: He said an orchid and a beautiful woman belonged together... It was our first date. He said that it was the orchid I wore that made him fall in love with me...
answer: He sounds like a real gentleman.

question: The best of the best he was... This cruise was supposed to be our 60th anniversary gift to each other. He died last Spring...
answer: I'm so sorry...

question: I was going to wear one...special for him...like a memory... But without him here I don't know why I should.
answer: Because an orchid and a beautiful woman belong together.

question: Is it true what they say about a captain and his boat.
answer: Is what true madame?

question: Madamoiselle...that the bigger the boat...the bigger the man...
answer: It is a theory I would be glad to put to the test.

question: In school, the Sisters said testing was my specialty.
answer: Enchante...

question: ...this is not a democracy. You don't get a vote. I'll say it again for the hearing impaired...
answer: This isn't right Finnegan. I've got a contract. And no questions asked.

question: Who asked any?
answer: He did...with a crowbar...you know the rules on a broken contract.

question: Here's what I think...I think these mokes below are a hit squad.
answer: I saw these guy perform...at Altmont ...you know that? They opened for the Stones...

question: Right now...there's some bozo sitting on his yacht at those coordinates they gave us, sipping his scotch and soda...totally unawares that we are about to deliver 500 kgs of high power torpedo to light up his ass...that's what's down there in that hold and who knows what the hell else...
answer: Hold still now...I was like three rows back. ...Jagger was here...I was here...

question: You don't give a shit about anything do you?
answer: Sure I do...I give a shit that at 0300 hour we reach our point of destination. I give a shit that those mojos got to do what they got to do, and 45 minutes later we are turn around and gone. I give a shit that by the time the sun comes up we are all safely tucked in bed.

question: That's it? That's all you give a shit about?
answer: Oh yeah...and that my stitch job doesn't make you uglier than you already are...this won't hurt a bit...

question: Switch over to auxiliary power, and run a circuit check.
answer: What the hell is going on?

question: Communication systems have failed! Radar...sonar...radios...I don't understand it.
answer: Nonsense! We're impervious to weather! Well unmelt it!! Ladies and gentlemen...your attention please... Ladies and gentlemen... This is the most technologically advanced sailing vessel on the water today. Every problem has been anticipated...the Captain has assured me that we will be up and running in no time...so enjoy yourselves...there's nothing to worry about...

question: Remain calm! Stop! Do you hear?
answer: Dear God.

question: Leila see what they're up to... What the hell... Joey!! Talk to me!
answer: Jezebel's dead...Hercules is right behind her! We got a gusher in the hull!

question: Shit!!
answer: What did you do to my kids!!

question: Me??
answer: No! The man in the moon!! Who's driving this thing?

question: What happened?
answer: We ran into a speedboat... Speedboat in the middle of the ocean...

question: How soon can we get up and running?
answer: We can't...we got one engine dead, and the other limping badly.

question: We were talking about my schedule...
answer: You're going to have to get a new one.

question: Not an option.
answer: Then you better start swimming.

question: Secure the zone of operation!! When I was a little bit of a pissant we lived down the road from where all the big cruise ships used to come into Sydney harbor... Mum and me we used to sit by our front door and watch them...she used to say "one day you're going to make your fortune in life on one of them..."
answer: Great woman your mother. Real foresight.

question: And she could do a hell of a barbie to boot! Belt up. You'll find all the parts you need up there.
answer: I assume somebody up there has made sure no distress signal can be sent.

question: You know what I'm gonna do after this...I'm gonna get a normal life...
answer: Joey...

question: ...Like a house in the suburbs... maybe a couple of kids...some sort of business...be in the bowling league...go to the ball games...
answer: Joey...it's okay...

question: What? You don't think I can have a normal life?
answer: Joey...look at me... We're gonna get what we gotta get... do what we gotta do...and get the hell outta here...okay?

question: 'Cause grease monkey ain't in my job description dick head...
answer: What I want to know is why the goddamn ocean is always cold...since I'm a kid I hate god damn cold water.

question: What was that?
answer: Nothing.

question: Someone's back there.
answer: Hey! Come out here!

question: Check it out!
answer: Hey! You hear me? Come out! Still no response.

question: Will you check it the hell out!!
answer: Man this shit is cold! I'm gonna kick your ass for putting me through this... I'm not screwing around with you man...I hate the cold water.

question: What is it man?
answer: I'm looking... On shit!

question: Helloooo? I'm sorry... This area is for authorized personnel only. As the assistant to the Purser, I'm afraid I'll have to ask you to vacate... Or maybe not.
answer: Where is everybody?

question: What do you mean?
answer: I mean...where is everybody?

question: Poolside?
answer: You tell it straight or I pull the trigger. Who are you?

question: A passenger...
answer: Where are the other passengers?

question: Mulligan?? What?? I can't hear you?? Repeat I...
answer: Oh my God. I didn't mean to... I thought it was one of them!

question: Stand down soldier! I said... Stand down!!
answer: I didn't mean to! I though it was one of them!

question: Hanover!...Hanover! Come in! Come in you son-of-a-bitch! Hanover!! Hanover!!
answer: Forget them...

question: Shut up! You hear me!!
answer: ...we gotta get outta here -- NOW.

question: I'm not staying here!
answer: It ain't any better out there! Lady, I'm telling you... OWW!

question: Now look what you did!
answer: I saved your life is what I did!

question: You're with that other bunch, right?
answer: What other bunch?

question: The thieves.
answer: I'm not a thief.

question: Then who are you?
answer: I'm their ride.

question: He's with them. They rob the joint blind and torpedo it to the bottom. He collects the insurance, and sails off into the sunset clean as a whistle. Right?
answer: All these people dead!! Because you screwed up on the math??

question: It's not going to help us!
answer: We're going to die here! We're going to die!

question: All right, be cool, everybody, nice and slow, no sudden moves. AHHH!!
answer: Noooo!

question: Jesus Christ lady...
answer: What are those things?

question: I don't know...
answer: Hey! Hey! Where are you going?

question: ...there's got to be a way to access out back there...
answer: But what makes you think there aren't more of hose...things...back there?

question: Nothing...you want to come, come... you don't...
answer: You don't have to be so touchy.

question: Look lady, I know you people are used to getting your way...
answer: What's that supposed to mean? You people.

question: You people...rich people...
answer: I'm not rich people.

question: Well, you sure do a good imitation.
answer: Thank you, I work at it... I heard you say you grew up in the projects in the Bronx... Trillian Daley... Projects...South Chicago.

question: Finnegan...John J...now that we've been properly introduced, can we get the hell out of here?
answer: So this boat of yours...that's what you do? Give people...rides.

question: That's what I do.
answer: Seen a lot of islands?

question: Quite a few.
answer: Since I'm a kid, I had this dream... I want to own my own tropical island... Beaches, warm ocean, lots of food, little clothes...population of one...

question: Anti social?
answer: Self sufficient...

question: With the emphasis on SELF, and in selfish, right?
answer: Takes one to know one.

question: Shoot it! Shoot it! The safety! The safety!
answer: I don't know where it is!

question: On the side!! Let's get the hell out of here! The safety...the safety... He flicks the safety on and off. Got it?
answer: Hey! I didn't have to come back.

question: Yeah you did...
answer: Right... You have a boat.

question: Boat or no boat... You woulda come back anyway. You're that kind of gal.
answer: Oh yeah? What kind is that?

question: The "come back" kind.
answer: How do you know that?

question: Who gives a shit about aft?
answer: That's where my boat's moored.

question: You trying to take over my show Finnegan, that what you trying to do?
answer: Just trying to get to my boat...

question: You stay away from that vault! You hear me?
answer: They respond to sound...

question: Nobody's shooting nobody...come on, just let us through the hatch!
answer: I'll kill you!! I'll fucking kill you!! I'll do it! I'll do it! I'm not playin' around here!

question: I once saw a guy put a fish in a bottle, then he corked it, sealing it tight, and threw it to a baby octopus. The little sucker felt its way around that bottle, and in less than two minutes, got that cork off, slid inside, and ate that fish.
answer: What the hell are you talking about?

question: Us...I'm talking about us... We're the fish.
answer: And what? These things are octopuses

question: I don't know what these things are ...all I know is...
answer: What...? What?? EEEEYYYYYAAAAHHHH!!!! EEEYYYAAAHHHH!!!!!

question: Eat this. FIRE IN THE HOLE! Looking good...
answer: You should talk...

question: GO! GO! GO! We're going to sink! We've got to get on deck!
answer: So how do you get from the Bronx to the South China sea?

question: You quit high school, lie about your age, join the navy, and next thing you know, four years are up and you need a way to make a living... I'll break the seal! Pull.
answer: Too small!

question: Finnegan...
answer: Yeah...

question: ...the minute you start your engines ...it's going to kill us, isn't it?
answer: Not unless we kill it first. Anything moves, you shoot. There's not much horsepower left in the engines, but there's enough noise...once this baby's set...I'll rev it up...that slimy bastard will come for it like candy...

question: If you blow up your boat, how are we going to get to the island?
answer: Jet ski...there's one left up there. ...let's see, it was red wire cross compressor blue wire...or blue cross red?

question: Jet ski...there's one left up there. ...let's see, it was red wire cross compressor blue wire...or blue cross red?
answer: Don't shoot!! Don't shoot!!

question: Just the man I wanted to see. On this puppy here, you remember if it's red to blue or blue to red...
answer: Not even a Joey, I'm glad to see you? Joey, what happened to your leg?

question: Joey, you want to get sucked out by a giant fucking mutated squid?
answer: Red cross over to blue double blue ...is that what it is? A squid?

question: Squid...squid like...squid type... it's got tentacles, a feed sac... probably one central nervous processor somewhere...what the hell do I know is going on deep down in the ocean...there's all sorts of shit we've never seen...eighty foot clams...60 foot sharks...I'm just guessing...can you get me more juice out of Hercules...fast?
answer: For juice, I gotta rebuild. That's not fast.

question: Seafood salad. You ever operate a jet ski?
answer: You want ME to go up there?

question: Not unless you can wire a missile or fix an engine.
answer: And what if I run into one of those things?

question: Don't forget the safety.
answer: Don't take too long...I'm not planning on being on the menu tonight.

question: You know what I think? I think our luck has just about run shit out...
answer: A little to the left...

question: I think we gotta stop floating from one fucked up situation to the next...
answer: Line it up now, nice and easy...

question: I'm telling you, man, we got to give the future some serious thought.
answer: I have been.

question: And what have you come up with?
answer: How does an island sound to you?

question: I gerry-rigged the ignition...all you gotta do is start her up...it won't go fast but it'll go loud... Man, don't go up there...
answer: One whistle... Start the engine...

question: She's gone...
answer: Second whistle you make it to the deck and get ready to jump...

question: All you're gonna do is get yourself killed...and for what? Some chick?
answer: You're beautiful what you're jealous, you know that, Joey?

question: You're beautiful what you're jealous, you know that, Joey?
answer: NOOO!! NOOOO!! HELPP!! HELPP!! Finnegan! Hurry!! Hurry!! Get me out of here!!

question: Don't look!! Push!!
answer: FINNEEGGGAANNN!!!

question: Grab my hands!! Push!! Push!! Go! Go! Go!
answer: Finnegan!!!

question: Get to the jet ski! Go! Get a good look...
answer: FINNEGAN!! COME ON!! Oh my God, oh my God. EEEEYYYYAAAHHH!!!!

question: I don't mean to drop in unannounced ...you ready...
answer: Soon as I get over the heart attack...

question: Three minutes...I'm not back...no matter what...you go...
answer: No...

question: You don't take orders very well, do you?
answer: I don't take orders at all.

question: This time, make an exception. Pantucci!... JOEY! Time to die, motherfucker.
answer: Where's you friend?
